author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
🇺🇸🇨🇳 Could Trump End the CCP? A Veteran Journalist Thinks So...
At a critical turning point in U.S.-China relations, Chinese-American political analyst Dr. Shen Ming-Shih makes a stunning claim:

“If Trump wants to break the CCP like the USSR, now is the best time.”

In this video, we dive into Dr. Shen’s explosive interview, where he outlines the triple crisis shaking China to its core:

⚠️ Internal Chaos – Military factions are divided over a potential Taiwan invasion in 2027, weakening Xi Jinping’s grip on power.
📉 Economic Meltdown – Real estate collapse, youth unemployment, and silent unrest echo the final days of the Soviet Union.
🇹🇼 Taiwan Tensions – War hawks vs. cautious generals. The CCP is split on how to deal with Taiwan—and the clock is ticking.

Dr. Shen believes the U.S., especially Trump’s team, has a rare opportunity to reshape history—but at what cost?
Could bold action inspire a democratic shift in China? Or would it spark war?

🔥 Join the debate and let your voice
title: From Soviet Shadows to China's Grip: Internal Strife, Economic Crash, Taiwan Flashpoint

title: CIA LAUNCHES CAMPAIGN TO SUBVERT THE CCP FROM WITHIN
